original_text: And it came to pass, that in the morning, behold, it was Leah: and he said to Laban, What is this thou hast done unto me? did not I serve with thee for Rachel? wherefore then hast thou beguiled me?
korean_text: 야곱이 아침에 보니 레아라 라반에게 이르되 외삼촌이 어찌하여 내게 이같이 행하셨나이까 내가 라헬을 위하여 외삼촌을 섬기지 아니하였나이까 외삼촌이 나를 속이심은 어찌됨이니이까

sentences.original_text: What is this thou hast done unto me?
did not I serve with thee for Rachel?
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 라헬을 위해 당신과 함께 일하지 않았습니까?

sentences.original_text: wherefore then hast thou beguiled me?
